news.name: World Vision’s family carnival at Sentosa
news.description: Finish the 30 Hour Famine with a bang at this carnival with family-friendly activities, a special art installation, and live music by The Freshman.

news.name: Doubt: A Parable
news.description: Do you know the Oscar-nominated movie starring Meryl Streep and Philip Seymour Hoffman? Now catch local theatre company Pangdemonium's adaptation of John Patrick Shanley’s Pulitzer Prize and Tony Award-winning play Doubt: A Parable.

news.name: Singapore International Festival of Arts
news.description: SIFA is a yearly tradition for many lovers of the arts here in Singapore. And this year, the festival continues with The Anatomy of Performance, the three-year concept that was first introduced last year.

news.name: i Light Singapore
news.description: The Marina Bay precinct is looking a touch brighter than usual this week as it illuminates for the annual sustainable light art festival.
